Package net.epzilla.stratification.query

Interface Summary
QueryParser Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
 

Class Summary
BasicQueryParser a basic implementation of the query parser.
LanguageDefinitions The common keywords in query language.
Query represents all components of a parsed query.
 

Enum Summary
QueryType represents types of supported queries.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidSyntaxException thrown when a query with invalid syntax is added.
